titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on synthetic quartz or fused silica photomask blank substrates.
A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on synthetic quartz or fused silica photomask blank substrates.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on synthetic quartz or fused silica photomask blank substrates.
